name: Floppy Time! - Legend of the Lost Floppy
name_original: Floppy Time! - Legend of the Lost Floppy
description:
Good you’re here!

Listen up agent we haven’t got much time
A programmer by the name of Colleen  is hosting a game jam
Where other programmers are challenged to write seriously tiny games
But somethings gone horribly wrong 
Now this is where you come in

THE GAMES HAVE BEEN STOLEN BY HACKERS

But don’t worry agent 
I’ve built my own tiny game  
so that you can recover the other tiny games and save the tiny game game jam

All you needs to do is grab that floppy to the left
and put it into the computer you’re standing next to
Oh and one more thing I’ve cut the power to the hackers systems
So it’s gonna get pretty dark out there

Just try and stay quite so you don’t alert the hackers defense system
You can do this by holding the shift key to sneak
And if you really  need to be really really quiet try sneaking against a wall

Now go save those tiny games agent!

ITS  FLOPPY TIME!

To progress to the next level you'll need to find the floppy and return it to the computer in under one minute. The amount of sound you make is represented by the  purple sound waves around your player 

You have night vision goggles
Three lives
And a silenced pistol with unlimited ammo 

ESC - quit game

WASD - movement 

SHIFT - sneak 

LEFT_MOUSE_BTN - fire gun

Enjoy the game! Can't wait to hear all the feedback!

Written in C and Raylib :)

This game was written for the 4mb game jam
s o   p l e a s e
consider it to be in an alpha state.

I'm continuing development and all feedback will be considered.
Plans to increase time limit and enemy damage to encourage stealth are already underway. 

Thanks for playing!
